text: Ernest Robert "Hank" Staveneau (February 6, 1893 - July 22, 1949Hockey deaths - July 1949) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played with the Ottawa Senators of the National Hockey Association. ==References== Category:1893 births Category:1949 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Ottawa Senators (NHA) players Category:People from Arnprior, Ontario
title: Ernie Staveneau
